statements: SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste;
SELECT plant_id, amount_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE processing_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT waste_type, amount_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE plant_id = 1 ORDER BY processing_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount_processed) AS total_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE processing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT plant_id, waste_type, amount_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE amount_processed > 1000 ORDER BY plant_id ASC, processing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT processing_date, amount_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY processing_date DESC;
SELECT plant_id, SUM(amount_processed) AS total_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE processing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT plant_id, waste_type, ROUND(amount_processed, 2) AS rounded_amount FROM WasteToEnergyPlantDailyWaste WHERE amount_processed > 1000 ORDER BY amount_processed DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlant;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM WasteToEnergyPlant;
SELECT processing_id, processing_date, waste_processed FROM WasteProcessing;
SELECT plant_name, location, plant_id FROM WasteToEnergyPlant ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteProcessing WHERE processing_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM WasteToEnergyPlant;
SELECT plant_id, location FROM WasteToEnergyPlant ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT processing_id, processing_date, waste_processed FROM WasteProcessing WHERE plant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlant INNER JOIN WasteProcessing ON WasteToEnergyPlant.plant_id = WasteProcessing.plant_id;

SELECT plant_name, SUM(waste_processed) AS total_waste_processed FROM WasteToEnergyPlant INNER JOIN WasteProcessing ON WasteToEnergyPlant.plant_id = WasteProcessing.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name ORDER BY total_waste_processed DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plant_information;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM waste_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT date, amount_processed FROM waste_management WHERE amount_processed > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_categories JOIN plant_information ON waste_categories.category_id = plant_information.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_management ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plant_information;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_categories FROM waste_categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT MAX(amount_processed) AS max_processed_amount FROM waste_management;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plant_information WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM waste_categories
SELECT category_name FROM waste_categories
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location FROM plant_details WHERE location='New York'
SELECT date, waste_processed FROM waste_daily_summary ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT plant_id, SUM(amount_processed) AS total_waste_processed FROM waste_logs GROUP BY plant_id HAVING total_waste_processed > 1000
SELECT * FROM plant_details
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plant_details WHERE plant_id = 3
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM plant_details ORDER BY plant_name DESC
SELECT wd.plant_id, wd.date, wl.waste_category, wl.amount_processed FROM waste_daily_summary wd JOIN waste_logs wl ON wd.plant_id = wl.plant_id AND wd.date = wl.date
SELECT wc.category_name, wl.amount_processed FROM waste_categories wc JOIN waste_logs wl ON wc.category_id = wl.waste_category
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlant;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM WasteToEnergyPlant ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM WasteCategories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT ws_id, date_processed FROM WasteProcessed WHERE waste_amount > 1000;
SELECT emp_name, department FROM PlantEmployees WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyPlant;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM WasteToEnergyPlant WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM WasteToEnergyPlant ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT p.plant_name, dp.processing_time FROM WasteToEnergyPlant p INNER JOIN DailyProcessed dp ON p.plant_id = dp.ws_id;
SELECT category_name, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_amount FROM WasteProcessed wp INNER JOIN WasteCategories wc ON wp.ws_id = wc.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
